short_description: Coursework site + scripts covering Git, Linux CLI, regex, and basic scripting.
long_description: Documented and practiced core developer tooling: Git/GitLab workflow, shell/CLI usage (find/grep/cut/wc), file permissions, SSH/SCP, and regex. Produced a static HTML/CSS lab report site and small utilities including a Python regex-based HTML tag extractor and a Bash script for prime-number processing with input validation.

short_description: Flask-based portfolio web app with searchable, filterable project listings.
long_description: Built a small web application in Python/Flask that renders a personal portfolio from a JSON dataset. Implemented project listing with sorting, full-text search across selectable fields, technique-based filtering, per-project detail pages, and a techniques overview page with usage statistics. Added auto-reload of the in-memory dataset when the backing JSON file changes.

short_description: Top-down arcade survival game built in C++ with SFML.
long_description: Designed and implemented a game in C++17 using SFML. Built a game engine loop with a state machine and multiple menus (start, name entry, pause, game over, leaderboard). Implemented enemy spawning with increasing intensity, player progression with level-up choices, weapons (assault rifle/shotgun/sniper), projectiles, collisions, obstacles, and a persistent leaderboard/highscore system.
